common.privacyNotice: Your API key and data are stored locally in your browser to ensure privacy. If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us via the community or feedback page.
common.dragAndDropText: Click or drag file here to upload
common.noTargetLanguage: Select at least one target language
common.singleFileModeTooltip: Keep only one file; new uploads replace the current file
common.bigNotice: For large files (>1MB), enable 'Large File Mode' to prevent lag.
common.largeModeTooltip: Hide input preview to improve performance for large files
common.hideResultsTooltip: Hide result preview to prevent page lag from large content
common.directExportTooltip: Automatically download after processing, skipping result preview
common.useCacheTooltip: Reuse previous translation cache to speed up processing
common.contextAwareTranslationTooltip: Translate with context for better coherence and accuracy (AI models only)
common.multiLanguageModeTooltip: Translate to multiple languages simultaneously, saved as separate files
common.resetUploadTooltip: Clear current input and uploaded files
common.sameLanguageTarget: Source and target languages are the same; automatically adjusted target to
common.sameLanguageSource: Source and target languages are the same; automatically adjusted source to
common.enterApiKey: Enter API Key or switch to Free API
common.enterLlmUrl: Please configure LLM URL in 'API Settings'
common.deepLXUnavailable: DeepLX node unavailable, automatically switched to GTX API (Free)
common.deeplUnavailable: DeepL node unavailable, please check configuration in 'API Settings'
common.llmUnavailable: LLM node unavailable, please check configuration in 'API Settings'
common.noFileUploaded: Please upload a file to process first
common.noSourceText: Please enter or paste text content
common.removeCharsAfterTranslationTooltip: Automatically remove specified characters after translation (separate multiple with spaces)
common.multiLangSettingsHint: Enter language codes, separated by comma or space.
common.retryCountTooltip: Number of retry attempts when translation fails
common.retryTimeoutTooltip: Maximum wait time per translation request

text-splitter.title: Text Splitter | Smart Segmenter for AI & Social Media
text-splitter.description: Text too long for AI? Smartly split content by chars or sentences for ChatGPT & social media. Auto-detect paragraphs, merge results & export. Fix limits now!
text-splitter.clientDescription: Smartly split long text by character count or sentence. Perfect for AI input, social media, and editing. For non-UTF-8 text (e.g., some French files), upload file directly for auto-encoding detection.
text-splitter.noExportableText: No exportable content detected, please check input
text-splitter.setExportFileName: Custom export filename (leave empty for default)
text-splitter.emptyForSymbolOnly: Leave empty to split by symbol only
text-splitter.splitByChineseParagraphTooltip: Smart split based on Chinese paragraph rules (newlines)
text-splitter.splitByEnglishParagraphTooltip: Smart split based on English sentence algorithms
text-splitter.checkDownloadDirectory: All split files exported, check download directory

subtitleTranslator.title: Subtitle Translator
subtitleTranslator.description: Batch translate SRT, ASS, VTT, LRC subtitles. 50+ languages.

mdTranslator.title: Markdown Translator
mdTranslator.description: Batch translate Markdown, preserving format and code

textSplitter.title: Text Splitter
textSplitter.description: Smart long text splitter for AI and social media

jsonValueExtractor.title: JSON Value Extractor
jsonValueExtractor.description: Batch extract JSON fields with formatting

jsonNodeEdit.title: JSON Batch Edit
jsonNodeEdit.description: Batch edit JSON nodes with prefix/suffix/replace

jsonValueTransformer.title: JSON Value Mapper
jsonValueTransformer.description: Field value mapping and migration with JSONPath

jsonValueSwapper.title: JSON Value Swapper
jsonValueSwapper.description: One-click swap of two field values

jsonNodeInserter.title: JSON Node Inserter
jsonNodeInserter.description: Batch insert new nodes at specified position

jsonSortClassify.title: JSON Sort & Classify
jsonSortClassify.description: Sort and group arrays with custom rules

jsonMatchUpdate.title: JSON Match Update
jsonMatchUpdate.description: Batch update data by matching fields

Metadata.title: ToolsByAI | Free Open Source AI Translation & Data Tools
Metadata.description: Looking for efficient dev tools? ToolsByAI offers 20+ free apps like Subtitle Translator & JSON Editor. Powered by DeepSeek & AI, secure & local. Start now!
Metadata.homeDescription: 20+ tools for translation, text, JSON, and data conversion. Boost efficiency for developers and creators.
Metadata.ogTitle: ToolsByAI | Free Open Source AI Translation & Data Tools
Metadata.ogDescription: Looking for efficient dev tools? ToolsByAI offers 20+ free apps like Subtitle Translator & JSON Editor. Powered by DeepSeek & AI, secure & local. Start now!

CopyToClipboard.unsupported: Browser does not support clipboard, please copy manually

feedback.feedback2: If you encounter issues or have suggestions, let me know! Your feedback drives future development and helps us build better tools for everyone.
feedback.feedback3: Please describe your use case, issue, or creative idea. I read every message and will respond/optimize as soon as possible.
feedback.placeholder: Leave a message (no login required, email optional for reply)
